item.title: Publishing Framework
item.description: Use a separate Obsidian vault Writing All Articles go under a category#Books#Frameworks Could have multiple sub folders as well Start an article with state as Draft Write article Test using npx quartz build --serve Publishing Using github profile repository website Remove the tag draft before pushing the article on web Create a build using npx quartz build Copy the generated html content from public/ to the publishing repository root 3.

item.title: Living Principles
item.description: No matter what Talk with Respect Never loose patience Its okay to feel emotions Forgive and Forget .
